page.title: 08People Of Maesbrook Village
page.content: The shop and post office had been closed down and the locals missed it because they had to travel out of the village to get their shopping. They all thought that Oswestry was a lovely town but some thought that it has been spoilt by all the new roads and buildings.None of them worked there because they were all retired. They had all come from big towns and cities e.g.Wolverhampton,to retire in the country.They rarely went out for any entertainment and only went to Oswestry for shopping 2-3 times a week.They all travelled by car. The only bus ran on a Wednesday from Maesbrook to Oswestry at 10am returning at 2pm.The people of Maesbrook were very happy where they lived and were very friendly towards each other and ready to answer our questions.
